content:
With Platinum status, you'll have access to some great benefits, including priority check-in, security, and boarding, as well as upgrades to First Class or Main Cabin Extra seats when available.

I've searched for round-trip flights from O'Hare International Airport (ORD) to McCarran International Airport (LAS) during weekdays, and here are some options:

**Cheapest Option:**

* July 12-15 (Tue-Fri): American Airlines Flight AA3432 (ORD-LAS) and AA3435 (LAS-ORD)
	+ Cost: $244.60 (Basic Economy) or $294.60 (Main Cabin)
	+ You can upgrade to Main Cabin Extra for an additional $40 per segment (total $80)

**Alternative Options:**

* July 13-16 (Wed-Sat): American Airlines Flight AA2402 (ORD-LAS) and AA2405 (LAS-ORD)
	+ Cost: $254.60 (Basic Economy) or $304.60 (Main Cabin)
	+ You can upgrade to Main Cabin Extra for an additional $40 per segment (total $80)
* July 14-17 (Thu-Sun): American Airlines Flight AA3430 (ORD-LAS) and AA3433 (LAS-ORD)
	+ Cost: $264.60 (Basic Economy) or $314.60 (Main Cabin)
	+ You can upgrade to Main Cabin Extra for an additional $40 per segment (total $80)

As a Platinum member, you'll also have access to:

* Complimentary upgrades to First Class or Main Cabin Extra seats when available
* Priority check-in, security, and boarding
* 2 free checked bags
* 100% bonus miles on flights

Keep in mind that prices may vary depending on the time of booking, and availability of seats. I recommend booking as soon as possible to secure the best rate.

Which of these options works best for you, or would you like me to explore more dates?
